data.name: Viking Berserker
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198970/I_Am_Jesus_Christ/?beta=1
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1366840/Moon_Farming/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355970/Jungle_House/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1434250/Horse_Shelter_2021/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1505940/Orc_Warchief_Strategy_City_Builder/





In the Old Norse written corpus, “berserkers” were those who were said to have fought in a trance-like fury.
Now, it’s a time for you to become one of them - to be a great Viking warrior, you need to learn how to be a Berserker.


Dark forces have opened the sky and come to our world, and it will be your job to stop all of them and send them back to where they came from.
Your journey will be full of different types of monsters and enemies!


Did we mention that it will be super difficult? If not, please keep in mind that you’ll need to use all your skills and learn new ones to reach the end.


Each Viking warrior should know how to use properly their axe. It’s time for you to learn how to use it too, like Thor - the God of war and fertility.


You’ll use different combat weapons, from traditional ones to magic ones. And yes, archery will be involved too! You’ll need all of that during your journey to the Northern lands.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Winows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Winows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence elements with fights and demons
